name: Demon Inside (RoleplayingX)
description:
Welcome to Demon inside, A Wormhole has just striked and now your on a new earth, the only question is how did the humans end up there with you. This is a mini mystery story, can you figure it out.

On New Earth, your Faction and Other Factions are at War with the Covid Army of Death and They are Hell Bent on Winning the War.
